modName: Sotteta Necromancer Outfit - Now With Pants
descriptionHtml:
you like Sotteta Necromancer Outfit?
You don't like the fact that it shows your behind in the cold harsh lands of skyrim.
Get Pants now!!!!

Brought to you by Vulpediablos & Monsta14. 

We both liked the design of the armor, however we wanted the butt to be covered because admit it you wouldn't walk around like that in the cold. We both started to edit the textures and got 2 different versions one that removes the fishnet part completely and one that tries to add cloth under it.

[img]http://s15.postimg.org/dxsch5oiz/title.jpg[/img]


Thanks to the author's and those who worked on the original armor.
Credits & Requirements:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59202/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D59202%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Sotteta Necromancer Outfit UNP - CBBE[/url] by Deserter X - Mitosuke uploaded by nsk13
author: Vulpediablos - Monsta 14
